TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlNamespaceResolver

summary.span: Describes a service that can return a XAML namespace that is based on its prefix as it is mapped in XAML markup.

span.span: Describes a service that can return a XAML namespace that is based on its prefix as it is mapped in XAML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Typkonverter und Markuperweiterungen können Abfragen für als Dienst auf dem Dienstkontext, der durch einen XAML-Objektwriter bereitgestellt wird, wenn der XAML-Objektwriter den Wertkonvertierungsverhalten aufruft.Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter [Typkonverter und Markuperweiterungen für XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) und [verfügbare Dienstkontexte Typkonverter und Markuperweiterungen](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md).For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md). ## Hinweise zur WPF-VerwendungWPF Usage Notes Diese Schnittstelle wird auch als Teil der WPF-XAML-Implementierung in implementiert die Klasse.This interface is also implemented as part of the WPF XAML implementation in the class. speichert Informationen zu XAML-Namespace und interagiert mit XAML-Prozessoren, um diese Informationen, um den Dienstkontext über dasselbe weiterzuleiten Schnittstelle. stores XAML namespace information and interacts with XAML processors to forward that information to the service context through the same interface.

param.name: prefix
param.span: The prefix for which to retrieve the XAML namespace information.

span.span: The prefix for which to retrieve the XAML namespace information.

summary.span: Retrieves a XAML namespace identifier for the specified prefix string.

span.span: Retrieves a XAML namespace identifier for the specified prefix string.

returns.span: The requested XAML namespace identifier, as a string.

span.span: The requested XAML namespace identifier, as a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration> GetNamespacePrefixes() cil managed
Public Function GetNamespacePrefixes () As IEnumerable(Of NamespaceDeclaration)

summary.span: Returns all the possible prefix-to-XAML namespace mappings ( values) that are available in the active XAML schema context.

span.span: Returns all the possible prefix-to-XAML namespace mappings ( values) that are available in the active XAML schema context.

returns.span: To get all the prefix strings, get the value from each value in the returned set.

span.span: To get all the prefix strings, get the value from each value in the returned set.

returns.span: To get prefixes for specific XAML namespaces, process any return value that has the desired value.

span.span: To get prefixes for specific XAML namespaces, process any return value that has the desired value.
